translated: It does not exist above that

original: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rtog pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rtog pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is associated with investigation and analysis and because investigation and analysis do not exist in the second absorption and so on.

original: mig gis gong ma'i gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mig gis gong ma'i gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba la /
translated: The eye does not see form of the higher realms.

original: gong ma'i bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong ma'i bkag pas rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The negation of the higher realms implies that it sees form of its own level and lower levels.

original: yang ci'i phyir mig gong ma'i gzugs kyi yul can du mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir mig gong ma'i gzugs kyi yul can du mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why is it not asserted that the eye is the object of higher form?

original: sa 'og ma'i mig ni yul rags pa la 'tsham pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i mig ni yul rags pa la 'tsham pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the eye of lower levels is compatible with coarse objects,

original: sa gong ma'i gzugs phra mo la lta ba'i nus pa med do //
analyzed: sa gong ma'i gzugs phra mo la lta ba'i nus pa med do //
translated: it does not have the power to see subtle form of higher levels.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang gong ma ni mig gis ma yin te zhes bya ba 'dir yang rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gong ma ni mig gis ma yin te zhes bya ba 'dir yang rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa khas blangs par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, the higher consciousness is not of the eye.

original: ji ltar sa gong ma'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gi yul ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sa gong ma'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gi yul ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the form of a higher realm is not the object of the eye of a lower realm,

original: sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa yang sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis brten par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa yang sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis brten par mi 'gyur te /
translated: so too, the consciousness of a higher realm does not depend on the eye of a lower realm.

original: rang gi rten dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di na lha tshangs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i dbang gis rnam par shes @99b pa skye ba'i phyir 'di ni khyad par bya dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ni rgol ba'i gzhi yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi rten dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir ro // 'di na lha tshangs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i dbang gis rnam par shes @99b pa skye ba'i phyir 'di ni khyad par bya dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ni rgol ba'i gzhi yin no zhe na /
translated: Because the object field of the eye and its support must be the same.üîΩThis is the basis of the opponent‚Äôs argument: ‚ÄúJust as the eye of a god of the Brahma realm sees the form of the Brahma realm, so too, it sees the form of the desire realm.

original: sprul pa'i gzugs mthong ba'i phyir na 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: sprul pa'i gzugs mthong ba'i phyir na 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: Because the eye of a god of the Brahma realm sees emanated form, this is explained.

original: gzugs ni 'di'i lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzugs ni 'di'i lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: The Abhidharmako≈õa mentions, ‚ÄúThe form of this body and both all.‚Äù

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba la ;
translated: This refers to the eye consciousness that was just explained.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi yul ni gzugs thams cad du yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi yul ni gzugs thams cad du yin te /
translated: The object field of the type of consciousness is all form.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mig gi shes pa'i yul ni rang gi sa pa'i gzugs kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mig gi shes pa'i yul ni rang gi sa pa'i gzugs kho na'o //
translated: The object of eye consciousness in the desire realm is form of its own level alone.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni rang dang 'og dang / gong ma'i sa pa'i gzugs yin la lus kyi yang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag gnyis ka rang dang / 'og dang / gong ma'i sa pa dag thams cad du yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni rang dang 'og dang / gong ma'i sa pa'i gzugs yin la lus kyi yang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag gnyis ka rang dang / 'og dang / gong ma'i sa pa dag thams cad du yin no //
translated: The object of eye consciousness of the first absorption is form of its own level, lower level, and higher level. The object of body consciousness is form and consciousness of all levels, its own level, lower levels, and higher levels.

original: de la rnam par shes pa'i rang gi sa pa'i gzugs ni rang gi rnam par shes pas shes pa'i 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa'i rang gi sa pa'i gzugs ni rang gi rnam par shes pas shes pa'i 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i gzugs so //
translated: Form of the level of consciousness is form of the desire realm and the first absorption that is known by its own consciousness.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par shes pa'i gong ma'i sa pa ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par shes pa'i gong ma'i sa pa ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
translated: Form of the higher level of the first absorption is form of the second absorption and so on.

original: sa 'og ma pa'i 'dod pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i 'dod pa'i gzugs so //
translated: Form of the lower level is form of the desire realm.

original: lus kyi gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rang gi sa pa dag ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa'i'o //
analyzed: lus kyi gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rang gi sa pa dag ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa'i'o //
translated: The form and consciousness of the body of its own level is that of beings born in the desire realm and the first absorption.

original: sa 'og ma pa dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i'o //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa dag ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i'o //
translated: Those of the lower level are of those born in the second absorption and so on.

original: sa gong ma pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa kho na'i'o //üîΩlus la 'og ma'i rna ba min //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa kho na'i'o // lus la 'og ma'i rna ba min //
translated: Those of the higher level are of those born in the desire realm alone.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The ear of the lower level is not for the body.

original: sa gong ma pa'i lus yin pas sa de pa 'am gong ma'i rna ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i lus yin pas sa de pa 'am gong ma'i rna ba yin gyi /
translated: The ear is for the body of that level or a higher level,

original: sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no //üîΩ'di'i rna ba'i yul ni de'i sa pa'i sa gong ma pa'i sgra ma yin no //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no // 'di'i rna ba'i yul ni de'i sa pa'i sa gong ma pa'i sgra ma yin no //
translated: but not for the body of the lower level.üîΩThe object of the ear of that level is the sound of that level or a lower level, but not the sound of a higher level.

original: rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin zhes bya ba ni rna ba'i dbang po ste ;
analyzed: rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin zhes bya ba ni rna ba'i dbang po ste ;
translated: The ear of a higher level is not for the sound of a lower level.

original: sa gong ma'i sgra sa 'og ma'i rna bas thos par ni nam yang mi nus so //
analyzed: sa gong ma'i sgra sa 'og ma'i rna bas thos par ni nam yang mi nus so //
translated: The ear sense faculty is never able to hear the sound of a higher level.

original: rnam par shes pa yang gong ma ni rna ba'i ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang gong ma ni rna ba'i ma yin te /
translated: Also, the consciousness of a higher level is not for the ear.

original: sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra bzhin no //
translated: It is like sound.

original: rnam par shes pa 'ang sgra ni 'di'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'ang sgra ni 'di'o //
translated: The consciousness is also like sound.

original: lus kyi 'ang gnyis ka thams cad du /
analyzed: lus kyi 'ang gnyis ka thams cad du /
translated: For the body, both are in all cases.

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang / 'og ma dang ; rang gi sa pa'i sgra thams cad du yin la /
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang / 'og ma dang ; rang gi sa pa'i sgra thams cad du yin la /
translated: The object of the just explained ear consciousness is all sound of the higher, lower, and same level.

original: lus kyi yang sgra dang rnam par shes pa dag gnyis ka thams cad du yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi yang sgra dang rnam par shes pa dag gnyis ka thams cad du yin no //
translated: Also, both sound and the body consciousness are of all types.

original: gsum dag ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /üîΩyul dang phrad pa yin pa'i phyir lus dang dbang po dang yul gyi bdag nyid can gsum char gdon mi za bar rang gi sa pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gsum dag ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / yul dang phrad pa yin pa'i phyir lus dang dbang po dang yul gyi bdag nyid can gsum char gdon mi za bar rang gi sa pa yin gyi /
translated: The three are of the same level,üîΩbecause they contact their object field.

original: rnam @100a * //
analyzed: rnam @100a * //
translated: The three that are the nature of body, sense faculty, and object field are definitely of the same level,

original: par shes pa la ni bye brag yod do //
analyzed: par shes pa la ni bye brag yod do //
translated: but consciousness is different.üîΩSmell and taste exist in the desire realm alone,

original: dri dang ro dag ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na na yod pa'i phyir dang / lus dang / reg pa dang / lus kyi dbang po ni sa lnga pa yin la /
analyzed: dri dang ro dag ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na na yod pa'i phyir dang / lus dang / reg pa dang / lus kyi dbang po ni sa lnga pa yin la /
translated: the body, tactility, and body sense faculty are of five levels,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: and body consciousness is of two levels.

original: 'di la dbye ba yod do //
analyzed: 'di la dbye ba yod do //
translated: Therefore there is a difference here.

original: yid ma nges te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yid ma nges te zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mental faculty is indefinite.

original: re zhig mtshungs pa'i sa pa ni sa lnga po dag tu skyes pa gang yin pa'i rang gi sa pa bzhi po kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: re zhig mtshungs pa'i sa pa ni sa lnga po dag tu skyes pa gang yin pa'i rang gi sa pa bzhi po kho na yin gyi /
translated: First, those of similar level are only the four of one's own level for those born in the five levels.

original: gang gi tshe rang gi sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rang gis pa'i chos rnams shes pa na'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rang gis pa'i chos rnams shes pa na'o //
translated: When the mental consciousness of one's own level knows phenomena of one's own level.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: sa lnga pa'i yul la yang yid la sogs pa thams cad pa dag yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sa lnga pa'i yul la yang yid la sogs pa thams cad pa dag yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said that all mental consciousnesses and so on are objects of the five levels.

original: yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i bar sa thams cad pa yin no //
analyzed: yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i bar sa thams cad pa yin no //
translated: Mental faculty, phenomena and mental consciousness are all levels from the desire realm level up to the summit of existence.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: When entering meditative attainment and when taking birth,

original: de la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe yid sa gong ma pa yin na ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba zhig bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas 'dod ba na spyod pa'iüîΩchos rnams shes pa na ste /
analyzed: de la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe yid sa gong ma pa yin na ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba zhig bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas 'dod ba na spyod pa'i chos rnams shes pa na ste /
translated: When entering meditative attainment, if the mind is of a higher level, then when one born in the desire realm enters desire realm phenomena with a desire realm mental consciousness that is the final state of the first absorption and so on,

original: de'i tshe yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
translated: at that time the mind is of a higher level.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos rnams ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: But the body, mental consciousness and phenomena are of a lower level.

original: yang na 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa sprul pa na ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa sprul pa na ste /
translated: Or when one born in the desire realm emanates desire realm emanations,

original: yid ni ci rigs par bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin la /
analyzed: yid ni ci rigs par bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin la /
translated: the mind is of the fourth absorption level as appropriate.

original: gsum ni 'dod par gtogs ba'i yin no //üîΩsa 'og ma'i yid ni bsam gtan dang por skye ba'i sprul pa sdud pa'i tshe ste /
analyzed: gsum ni 'dod par gtogs ba'i yin no // sa 'og ma'i yid ni bsam gtan dang por skye ba'i sprul pa sdud pa'i tshe ste /
translated: The other three are of the desire realm.

original: yid sa 'og ma pa yin la /
analyzed: yid sa 'og ma pa yin la /
translated: Or when one born in a lower level emanates emanations in the first absorption, the mind is of a lower level.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams ni sa gong ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams ni sa gong ma pa yin no //
translated: the body, mental consciousness and factors are of a higher stage.

original: skye ba'i tshe yid sa gong ma pa yin la /
analyzed: skye ba'i tshe yid sa gong ma pa yin la /
translated: When one is born, the mental faculty is of a higher stage.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams sa 'og ma pa yin pa ni gang zhig sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams su nyid mtshams sbyor na ste /
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams sa 'og ma pa yin pa ni gang zhig sa gong ma pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams su nyid mtshams sbyor na ste /
translated: When one is born in the realm of desire or the realm of fine-materiality after the thought of a higher stage, the body, the mental faculty, the mental consciousness and the factors are of a lower stage.

original: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i yid ni sa gong ma pa yin la /
translated: The mental faculty is of a higher stage.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sa 'og ma pa yin no //
translated: The body and the mental consciousness are of a lower stage.

original: chos rnams ni de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi ldan pa dag yin no //
analyzed: chos rnams ni de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi ldan pa dag yin no //
translated: The factors are of this stage or of a higher stage, but not of a lower stage.

original: de bzhin du yid sa 'og ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid sa 'og ma pa yin la /
translated: In the same way, the mental faculty is of a lower stage.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams sa gong ma pa yin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams nas 'chi 'phos te /
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / chos rnams sa gong ma pa yin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams nas 'chi 'phos te /
translated: The body, the mental faculty, the mental consciousness and the factors are of a higher stage when one is born in the realm of desire after the thought of a lower stage.

original: de nas @100b gzugs kyi khams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba na ste /
analyzed: de nas @100b gzugs kyi khams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba na ste /
translated: Then, when linking at death to the form realm,

original: de'i tshe yid ni sa 'og ma pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe yid ni sa 'og ma pa yin la /
translated: at that time the mind is of a lower level.

original: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par shes pa ni sa gong ma pa yin no //
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par shes pa ni sa gong ma pa yin no //
translated: The body and mental consciousness are of a higher level.

original: chos rnams ni ma nges te /
analyzed: chos rnams ni ma nges te /
translated: Dharmas are not definite.

original: de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi ldan pa dag gam /
analyzed: de'i sa pa dang / sa gong ma pa dang mi ldan pa dag gam /
translated: They are either of its level, of a higher level, or not possessed.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems so //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa'i sems so //
translated: Or it is a desire realm emanating mind.

original: 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: This is extensively explained in the treatise Attainment of Knowledge, which states:üîΩFrom the uncontaminated

original: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su //
translated: up to the third absorption,üîΩfrom pure minds of its levelüîΩand from afflicted minds of its levelüîΩand from pure minds of lower levels,üîΩafflicted minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds,üîΩafflicted minds of its level and pure minds of its level arise.

original: ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba //
analyzed: ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba //
translated: From afflicted minds, pure minds of lower levels arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds,üîΩafflicted minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds of its level,üîΩpure minds of its level and pure minds of higher levels arise.üîΩFrom pure minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of its level do not arise.üîΩFrom pure minds of lower levels,üîΩpure minds of its level and pure minds of higher levels arise.üîΩFrom pure minds of lower levels,üîΩafflicted minds of its level do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of its level and pure minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,

original: skye bo dag pa las de bzhin //
analyzed: skye bo dag pa las de bzhin //
translated: pure minds of lower levels do not arise.

original: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
translated: From afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of its level and pure minds of its level arise.

original: nyon mongs can las rang dag dang // nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang //
analyzed: nyon mongs can las rang dag dang // nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang //
translated: From afflicted minds of its level,üîΩpure minds of lower levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of its level and pure minds of its level arise.

original: 'chi 'pho dag las nyon mongs kun //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dag las nyon mongs kun //
translated: From afflicted minds of its level,üîΩpure minds of lower levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of higher levels do not arise.

original: nyon mongs can las gong ma min //üîΩzhes bya ba dang / rigs mi mthun pa'i gsum par 'gro //
analyzed: nyon mongs can las gong ma min //üîΩzhes bya ba dang / rigs mi mthun pa'i gsum par 'gro //
translated: From afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of its level and pure minds of its level arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩpure minds of lower levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,üîΩafflicted minds of higher levels do not arise.üîΩFrom afflicted minds of its level,

original: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin //
analyzed: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin //
translated: This is the meditative attainment of leaping over.

original: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o //üîΩzhar las 'ongs pa'i skabs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // zhar las 'ongs pa'i skabs zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is the kind of thing that is meant.üîΩThe topic of the digression is finished.üîΩThe digression is finished.

original: zhar las 'ongs pa ni zhar las byung ba ste /
analyzed: zhar las 'ongs pa ni zhar las byung ba ste /
translated: The topic that was set aside was:

original: lus gang la gnas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: lus gang la gnas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni /
translated: ‚ÄúIn what body does one abide when one enters these meditative attainments?‚ÄùüîΩThis was set aside by the statement:

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong zhes bya ba de las 'ongs ba yin no //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong zhes bya ba de las 'ongs ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe eye sees forms. ‚Äù

original: khams kyi rab tu dbye ba'i skabs su bab pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: khams kyi rab tu dbye ba'i skabs su bab pas de'i phyir /
translated: Since the topic of the classification of the elements is relevant here,üîΩtherefore it is said:

original: gnyis kyi rnam shes phyi yi lnga //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di smos so //
analyzed: gnyis kyi rnam shes phyi yi lnga // zhes bya ba 'di smos so //
translated: The two consciousnesses are external, the five.

original: lnga zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khams gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khams gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The five are mentioned in order to clarify the element of mental objects.

original: phyi'i zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi'i zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: External is mentioned in order to clarify the eye, etc.

original: phyi'i lnga kho na nyid kyis shes par bya ba yin no zhes nges par gzugs bas gnyis kyis shes par bya ba kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi'i lnga kho na nyid kyis shes par bya ba yin no zhes nges par gzugs bas gnyis kyis shes par bya ba kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: It is understood that the five are known by the two, i.e., the eye and mental consciousness, because it is said that the five are known by the external alone.

original: chos mngon pa las srid pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad do //
analyzed: chos mngon pa las srid pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad do //
translated: The Abhidharma explains them from the perspective of existence.

original: nges par gzung ba nyid kyi khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba nyid kyi khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: The remaining thirteen elements are definitely known to be objects of mental consciousness,

original: lnga po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not objects of the five sense consciousnesses.

original: 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa kho na'o zhes bya bar nges par gzung bas chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag gi / lhag ma rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni mi rtag go zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa kho na'o zhes bya bar nges par gzung bas chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag gi / lhag ma rnams dang / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni mi rtag go zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is definitely known that the unconditioned is permanent, it is understood that one part of the element of mental objects is permanent, the rest and one part of the element of mental objects are impermanent.

original: ji ltar 'dus ma byas kho na rtag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus ma byas kho na rtag pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is only the unconditioned permanent?

original: dus su rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus su rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not move in time.

original: de med pa ni skye ba la sogs pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩchos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
analyzed: de med pa ni skye ba la sogs pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro // chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
translated: Because it does not exist, it does not have the characteristics of the conditioned, such as arising.

original: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
analyzed: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
translated: Half of the element of mental objects and the twelve internal elements are faculties.üîΩThe rest are not faculties.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Abhidharmakosa states,

original: khams dag go zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: khams dag go zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The faculties are twenty two.

original: mdo las / mig @101a * //
analyzed: mdo las / mig @101a * //
translated: A sutra states,üîΩThe eye faculty,

original: gi dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni de nas bram ze rang bzhin nyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: gi dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni de nas bram ze rang bzhin nyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: then the brahmin Srota-√¢sra obtamed from the Bhagavat:

original: kye goo ta ma dbang po rnams zhes bgyi na /
analyzed: kye goo ta ma dbang po rnams zhes bgyi na /
translated: ‚ÄúO Gautama, you speak of the faculties.

original: kye goo ta ma dbang po rnams ni du /
analyzed: kye goo ta ma dbang po rnams ni du /
translated: O Gautama, how many faculties are there?

original: dbang po ci snyed cig gis dbang po bsdus par 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po ci snyed cig gis dbang po bsdus par 'gyur /
translated: By how many faculties are the faculties included?‚Äù

original: bram ze / dbang po ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: bram ze / dbang po ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBrahmin, there are twenty two faculties.

original: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang dag zhig ce na /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang dag zhig ce na /
translated: What are the twenty two?

original: mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang /
translated: The eye faculty, the ear faculty, the nose faculty, the tongue faculty, the body faculty, the mind faculty, the female faculty, the male faculty, the life faculty,

original: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
translated: The faculty of faith, the faculty of perseverance, the faculty of mindfulness,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /
translated: the faculty of concentration and the faculty of wisdom, the faculty producing complete knowledge of the unknown, the faculty of complete knowledge and the faculty of possessing complete knowledge.

original: bram ze 'di dag ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: bram ze 'di dag ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: Brahmin, these are the twenty two faculties.

original: dbang po 'di dag tsam gyis dbang po bsdus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: dbang po 'di dag tsam gyis dbang po bsdus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: The faculties are completely included in just these.

original: mdo las ni skye mched drug rnam par gzhag pa las lus kyi dbang po'i mjug thogs su yid kyi dbang po bshad la /
analyzed: mdo las ni skye mched drug rnam par gzhag pa las lus kyi dbang po'i mjug thogs su yid kyi dbang po bshad la /
translated: In the sutras, the mental faculty is explained immediately after the body faculty in the presentation of the six bases.

original: chos mngon pa rnams kyis ni rnam pa ston pa dag tu ches bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdmigs pa med cing lung du ma bstan la /üîΩgcig pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams 'don pa'i go rims gcig tu byas te /
analyzed: chos mngon pa rnams kyis ni rnam pa ston pa dag tu ches bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir / dmigs pa med cing lung du ma bstan la / gcig pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams 'don pa'i go rims gcig tu byas te /
translated: The Abhidharmikas, in order to easily demonstrate the presentation of the faculties in the Abhidharma,

original: de nas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po yid kyi dbang po ston to //üîΩde la zhes bya ba ni don nye bar dgod pa'i tshig ste /üîΩdbang po gang dag bshad pa la //üîΩchos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir chos kyi phyed ces bya ba'o //üîΩsrog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang zhes bya ba la /üîΩchos kyi khams kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po dang / tshor ba'i dbang po lnga dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / gsum po dag gi cha ste /
analyzed: de nas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po yid kyi dbang po ston to //üîΩde la zhes bya ba ni don nye bar dgod pa'i tshig ste /üîΩdbang po gang dag bshad pa la //üîΩchos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir chos kyi phyed ces bya ba'o //üîΩsrog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang zhes bya ba la /üîΩchos kyi khams kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po dang / tshor ba'i dbang po lnga dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / gsum po dag gi cha ste /
